ygData.subject: NEAT enhancements

All,

Ken's papers mention (at least I think that they do) that (dynamic) 
=
annealing of mutation rates might be advantageous in order to confine 
glob=
al searching after a while to a promising region in search space. 
Having r=
ead some papers, I also found indications that a hybrid 
weight training al=
gorithm (global search by means of genetic 
algorithms and local search usi=
ng some gradient descent algorithm) 
might be able to produce better result=
s than genetic algorithm search 
alone. The reason is, that each type of al=
gorithm performs well 
mostly only in its specific field. Has anyone furthe=
r insights into 
this topic ? Has anyone tried to implement any of the appr=
oaches 
mentioned ? 

Also time delay network connections might provide imp=
rovements for 
some model estimation tasks. Has anyone tested / implemented=
 yet any 
of these ideas ?

Thanks for any comments,
Achim
